name: Hotel Cipriani, A Belmond Hotel, Venice
description: Set on Giudecca Island, Hotel Cipriani, A Belmond Hotel, Venice offers stunning views of Venice Lagoon and the Doge's Palace. It features a large outdoor swimming pool, tennis court and luxury wellness facilities. The 5-star Hotel Cipriani, A Belmond Hotel, Venice offers elegant interior design and plenty of outdoor areas where you are invited to relax and enjoy the view. A full buffet breakfast is available each morning. Drinks are available from the bar and the à la carte restaurant serves delicious Italian cuisine. Dining options include the gourmet Oro Restaurant, Cip's Club with its wooden terrace with views on St Mark's and the Il Porticciolo Restaurant, ideal for a seafood lunch. Rooms and suites are spacious, comfortable and packed with amenities. You will have free Wi-Fi, complimentary e-magazines and a HD flat-screen TV. Views are across the lagoon or of the garden and vineyard. You are 4 minutes from St. Mark's Square by the hotel's private boat service. A shuttle service from/to Venice Marco Polo Airport and Venezia Santa Lucia Train Station can be organized on request.

name: Villa Barbarich
description: Set in a beautifully renovated villa 2 km outo/frside Mestre, Hotel Villa Barbarich Venice Mestre offers a free wellness centre, a gourmet restaurant and elegantly furnished rooms. Rooms are all air conditioned and come with wood-beamed ceilings and precious textiles. Rooms feature views of the shared garden, a flat-screen satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. At the Hotel Villa Barbarich Venice Mestre you can work out in the on-site gym for free. An elegant shared lounge to relax is also available. Venezia Mestre Train Station with links to Venice historic centre is 4 km from the property. Venice Marco Polo Airport is only a 10-minute drive away. Shuttle services to/from the train station or airport can be arranged on request, at extra charge.

name: Ca' del Moro
description: Built in 2007, the structure is part of a comprehensive sports resort in the exclusive island of Lido, with swimming pool, tennis courts and football pitches. With an elegant bar for snacks and aperitifs, and refined common areas, you will enjoy a most relaxing time between visits to the historic centre of Venice – Saint Mark’s Square can be reached in only 30 minutes by boat, and shuttles can be arranged on request. Ca' Del Moro boasts 82 new, spacious rooms fitted in a distinct modern style and equipped with the latest amenities, designed to provide you with a welcoming and functional ambiance.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Venice Mestre San Giuliano
description: A convenient base on the mainland of Venice, the Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Mestre offers modern accommodations within easy reach of the airport, motorways and the many islands of Venice. This hotel is ideal for guests with a cruise or flight leaving from Venice, or who prefer to leave the crowds behind after a day of exploring the city. Private transfers are available, and guests can catch a ten-minute bus ride to Venice at the station across the street. Rooms are spacious, tastefully decorated and fully equipped with modern conveniences. Enjoy the outdoor pool, modern fitness room and on-site restaurant with terrace seating and a selection of fine wines.Official Hotel Information

name: Ca' Tessera Venice Airport
description: Ca' Tessera is a historic country house with wide garden, sauna and indoor swimming pool. It is just 1 km from Venezia Marco Polo Airport, and parking is free. The property is just outside Tessera. The bus stop to Mestre is outside the main gate, the bus stop to Venice a 5-minute walk away. The Ca' Tessera's lounge features a fireplace and exposed wood beams on the ceiling. All rooms come with private bathroom, and are equipped with satellite TV and air conditioning.

name: Voco Venice Mestre - The Quid
description: voco® Venice Mestre - The Quid is a short distance from the Veneto Region’s main airports, Marco Polo (VCE) and Treviso (TSF). Ideally located just two minutes’ drive from the A4 motorway it has great access to Venice Island and Mestre city centre, and some of Venice’s key business hubs including the Commercial AEV Terraglio area and the Venice Exhibition Centre. From AM to PM, you’ll have the space you need to relax, socialise, and enjoy yourself. Active your body by working out in your room or in our gym and then spend some well-deserved me time in rooms with cosy bedding. With event and meeting spaces for up to 260 people ideal for any occasion, make your mark with the help of our warm and welcoming hosts. We serve international and local Italian specialities and drinks in our restaurant and bar to ensure that your lunches or dinners are a roaring success and something to remember during your stay.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: NOLINSKI Venezia
address: Calle Larga Xxii Marzo, 30124 Venice, Veneto
description: A few canals over from the Piazza San Marco and La Fenice opera house stands the Nolinski Venezia, a 5 star hotel. Its majestic faade, adorned with mythical creatures, the daughters of Poseidon, reminds us of the potency that La Serenissima draws from its waters. Here we enter Venetian history through the doors of the old Stock Exchange. Art Nouveau, Stile Liberty and Modernism are brought together in well-proportioned harmony, enhanced by the work of interior designers Le Coadic Scotto.iHotelier/iStay

name: My Rialto Palace
description: Set in Venice and within 600 metres of Frari Basilica, My Rialto Palace has a garden, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. The property is situated 1 km from Basilica San Marco, 1.1 km from Piazza San Marco and 1.1 km from Doge's Palace. The guest house features family rooms. All rooms in the guest house are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and a hair dryer, all guest rooms at My Rialto Palace have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms also offer a terrace. At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near My Rialto Palace include Scuola Grande di San Rocco, Venice Santa Lucia Train Station and Rialto Bridge. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 13 km from the guest house.

name: Country House Country Club
description: No description found

name: Palazzetto Pisani
description: No description found

name: Hotel Palazzo Stern
description: Featuring a terrace and rooftop hot tub on the Grand Canal. Staff at Hotel Palazzo Stern are always available and can organise excursions, tours and tickets. The building still has many original frescoes and mosaics. Rooms are traditionally decorated and some have canal views. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, an espresso coffee maker, and slippers. A la carte breakfast is available daily. The Ca’ Rezzonico vaporetto waterbus stop is next to the hotel. St. Mark's Square is a 10-minute walk away, across the Accademia Bridge.

name: JW Marriott Venice Resort & Spa
address: Isola Delle Rose P.O. Box 731, Laguna di San Marco, Venice, 30133 Venice, Veneto
description: Enchantment awaits at JW Marriott Venice Resort and Spa. Beautifully situated on the private island of Isola delle Rose in Venice, Italy, our luxury five-star hotel offers a lush retreat, the perfect respite from the excitement of the city. Your pampering begins as you are transported in just a few minutes from St. Mark's Square by our private and complimentary water shuttle to our 40-acre resort filled with gardens, olive groves and exceptional amenities. Feel immediately relaxed as you enter our light-filled rooms, suites and private residences. Savor award-winning cuisine at our tempting restaurants, recharge at our JW Venice Spa - one of Venice's premier wellness destinations, play in the pools, take a cooking class or join any of our family friendly activities. Our hotel's unmatched venues create memorable backdrops for weddings, meetings and special celebrations, each with unique features and world-class services. Let the magic of our hotel's natural ambiance set the scene for your escape in Venice.Marriott

name: Hotel Giorgione
description: Completely decorated in a classic style with antique furniture and Venetian décor, the 4-star Hotel Giorgione is a 18th-century building in central Venice. The Rialto Bridge is 400 metres away. The elegant rooms feature precious fabrics and Murano-glass chandeliers. They combine period furniture with modern amenities, such as an LCD TV with satellite channels. WiFi is free throughout. The rich breakfast buffet includes freshly baked croissants, eggs and bacon. During summer, it is served in the very characteristic courtyard with fountain. The property also boasts an outdoor seasonal pool, hot tub and solarium. Located in the Cannaregio district, Giorgione Hotel is a 15-minute walk from St Mark’s Square, the Doge’s Palace.

name: Hotel Apostoli Garden
description: Situated 500 metres from Rialto Bridge, Hotel Apostoli Garden offers 3-star accommodation in Venice and has a garden. Popular points of interest nearby include Piazza San Marco, La Fenice Theatre and Frari Basilica. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms come with a terrace. Popular points of interest near Hotel Apostoli Garden include Basilica San Marco, Doge's Palace and Ca' d'Oro. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Dona Palace
description: Dona Palace is a 4-star boutique hotel 2 minutes' walk from Saint Mark's Square in central Venice. Facing the Ducal Palace's canal, it offers elegant Venetian-style rooms with an LCD satellite TV, minibar and free Wi-Fi. Set in a 14th-century building, rooms and suites at Hotel Dona Palace have a classic design with wood furniture and carpeted floors. Each one has air conditioning and a private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries. Some are fitted with wooden floors. An American breakfast is served each morning. The hotel has its own internal garden, where drinks are served in summer, and a landing dock for water taxis. A pleasant 5-minute walk will take you to the Bridge of Sighs.

name: Ca' Mazzega
description: Just 15 metres from the Venier vaporetto waterbus stop on Murano Island, Ca’ Mazzega Murano Grand Canal view apartments offers elegant apartments with canal views and a fully equipped kitchenette with dishwasher. Free WiFi is provided in the entire property. Featuring a private garden, all air-conditioned apartments offer a flat-screen TV, a living/dining area, and a bathroom with washing machine and hairdryer. In the summer, guests can enjoy meals in the furnished private garden. Water buses to/from Venice and Santa Lucia Train Station leave from the pier right opposite Ca’ Mazzega. The apartments are set in a pedestrian-only area, at a walking distance from the island’s Murano glass factories and shops. The Murano Glass Museum is less than a 10-minute walk away.

name: Relais Piazza San Marco
address: San Marco, 312, Calle San Basso, 30100 Venice, Veneto
description: Set right beside St. Mark's Square and the exclusive Mercerie shopping street, this guest house enjoys a great location in Venice's historic centre. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and a TV. Rooms come with either classic Venetian decor or contemporary furnishings. Each comes with an en suite bathroom, and many have carpeted floors. 312 Piazza San Marco is set in 2 historic buildings opposite each other. La Fenice Opera House, Rialto Bridge and the Bridge of Sighs are less than 10 minutes' walk away.

name: Ausonia Hungaria Wellness & Lifestyle
address: Gran Viale S.M. Elisabetta 28, 30126 Venice, Veneto
description: Ausonia Hungaria is set in a building 250 metres from the beach and 5 minutes’ walk from the Vaporetto water bus stop. Modern rooms come with a flat-screen satellite TV. The hotel features the Lanna Gaia wellness centre, which includes sauna, Turkish bath and a range of massages. Staff are graduates of the prestigious Lanna Thai Academy in Thailand. The restaurant is specialised in traditional Italian cuisine. During the summer, guests can enjoy drinks on the terrace by the bar. The Ausonia Hungaria hotel is 9 km from Circolo Golf Venezia. St. Mark’s Square can be reached with a 15-minute ride on the vaporetto water bus.

name: Elite Hotel & Spa
description: Elite Hotel & Spa is located in Mestre, a 10-minute bus ride from Venice and 9 km from Venice Marco Polo Airport. It offers free Wi-Fi and modern, air-conditioned accommodation. A bus to Mestre Train Station stops just opposite to the property. Rooms and apartments at the Elite come with satellite LCD TV and a minibar. Apartments also include a microwave. Private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Some rooms feature tea and coffee making facilities and free mineral water. Every morning a buffet breakfast including eggs, bacon, cold cuts, cheese, fresh fruit and sweet options is served. Bio and gluten free alternatives can be requested, and guests can also enjoy cocktails and international dishes at the FOX bistrot. Guest can enjoy spa with heated swimming pool, steam bath, relax area and massages for extra charge. Fitness lovers can enjoy the Elite Hotel’s gym, complete with massage chairs. The hotel staff can also book trips around the Doge’s Palace and other destinations in Venice. The Elite Residence is a 10-minute drive from the A57 Tangenziale Mestre motorway.

name: Hilton Molino Stucky Venice
description: Hilton Molino Stucky Venice is just a short boat-ride from St. Mark’s Square by shuttle boat and easily reachable from Venice Marco Polo airport. It is one of the most important architectural projects of the end of 19th century, formerly a flour mill and granary on the Giudecca Island. Marvel at the spectacular views of the city and the lagoon as you enjoy a drink in the contemporary 8th floor Skyline Rooftop Bar or spoil yourself in the unique panoramic rooftop pool. The hotel features one of the largest Congress Centers of the city making it the ideal location for both business and leisure travelers. Relax your senses with a fully equipped fitness & wellness center or savor the Chef's Mediterranean dishes at the Aromi Restaurant. The hotel proudly presents, one of the biggest suites in Venice, a 300m²/3229 sq. ft. Presidential Suite with fitness room, hydro pool, private panoramic tower and elevator. Hold an event in one of 13 function rooms or convene in Venice's largest ballroom offering a breakout area, wireless internet access and space for up to 1000 guests.Hilton

name: Hotel Alle Torri
description: This hotel is situated on the outskirts of Venice, near Riviera del Brenta with its Venetian Villas. The hotel offers free parking. All rooms have air conditioning, heating, a satellite TV, a fridge, phone, a safe and private bathroom with shower. Alle Torri can arrange tours to the main destinations in the Lagoon, Venice, Murano and Burano. Guests can take advantage of the many facilities surrounding the property, including several shopping centres, a multi-screen cinema and several pubs and discos. A tram with links to Mestre train station, 2 km away, stops 200 metres from the hotel. A bus stop with links to Padova and the centre of Venice is located in front of the Alle Torri. Tickets are available at the reception.

name: Viktoria Palace Hotel
description: Set on the island of Lido, the Viktoria Palace offers a quiet location, 1 km from Venice's most famous beaches. The Vaporetto Stop to St. Mark's Square is a 20-minute walk or a 5-minute bus ride away. All air-conditioned rooms at Viktoria Palace Hotel come with satellite TV and a minibar. Some rooms have classic Venetian style furnishings and parquet floors. Wi-Fi is available throughout. Breakfast is a simple buffet with cold meats, cheeses and pastries. It can be enjoyed on the hotel terrace with views of the Venetian Lagoon and surrounding islands. Venice's historic centre is a 10-minute Vaporetto ride from Lido Island, which is famous for hosting the annual Venice Film Festival. Car ferries connecting the island to the mainland leave from Lido San Nicolò, 500 metres from the hotel. Guests can rent bikes and on-site parking is free.

name: Hotel Palladio
description: Hotel Palladio is situated in the quiet village of Malcontenta. Garage parking is free. Rooms feature air-conditioning, a satellite TV, and a private bathroom. The hotel’s friendly and professional personnel offer a personalised service in this comfortable hotel. You can enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning. Hotel Palladio is set at the end of the Brenta Riviera, and the bus to Venice stops right outside. If you prefer you can take the ferry from the nearby Fusina terminal.
